text: This article is a list of political parties in Republika Srpska, Bosnia and Herzegovina. Republika Srpska has a multi-party system with numerous political parties, in which no one party often has a chance of gaining power alone, and parties must work with each other to form coalition governments. ==The parties== ===Parties represented in the National Assembly=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! colspan=2 | Name ! Abbr. ! Ideology ! Leader ! MPs |- ! style="background-color:darkred" | | Alliance of Independent Social Democrats Савез независних социјалдемократа Savez nezavisnih socijaldemokrata |SNSD |Serbian nationalism Social democracy |Milorad Dodik | |- ! style="background-color:" | |Serb Democratic Party Српска демократска Странка Srpska Demokratska Stranka |SDS |National conservatism Serbian nationalism |Mirko Šarović | |- ! style="background-color:#6082B6" | | Party of Democratic Progress Партија демократског прогреса Partija demokratskog progresa |PDP |National conservatism Pro-Europeanism |Branislav Borenović | |- ! style="background-color:darkblue" | | Democratic People's Alliance Демократски народни савез Demokratski Narodni Savez |DNS |National conservatism Serbian nationalism |Nenad Nešić | |- ! style="background-color:red" | | Socialist Party Социјалистичка Партија Socijalistička Partija |SP |Social democracy Democratic socialism |Petar Đokić | |- ! style="background-color:gold" | | Togenther for Bosnia and Herzegovina Заједно за Босну и Херцеговину Zajedno za Bosnu i Hercegovinu |ZBiH |Bosniak minority interest Croat minority interest |Edin Ramić | |- ! style="background-color:#0070FF" | | National Democratic Movement Народни демократски покрет Narodni Demokratiski Pokret |NDP |National conservatism Pro-Europeanism |Dragan Čavić | |- ! style="background-color:darkblue" | | United Srpska Уједињена Српска United Srpska |US |Serbian nationalism National conservatism |Nenad Stevandić | |- ! style="background-color:#DB7093" | |Democratic Union Демократски савез Demokratski savez |DEMOS ||National conservatism Serbian nationalism |Nedeljko Čubrilović | |- |} ===Defunct and historical parliamentary parties=== {| class="wikitable" font-size:90%; |- ! colspan=2 | Name ! Abbr. ! Ideology ! Leader ! Years ! Note |- ! style="background:#CD00CD;"| | Serb National Alliance Српски народни савез Srpski narodni savez | SNS | Serbian nationalism Populism | Biljana Plavšić | 1997–2004 | Abolished in 2004 |- ! style="background:#b30000;"| | National Democratic Party Народна демократска странка Narodna Demokratska Stranka | NDS | National Conservatism | Krsto Jandrić | 2003–2013 | Merged into the NDP |- ! style="background:blue;"| | Democratic Party Демократска партија Demokratska partija | DP | Conservatism Europeanism | Dragan Čavić | 2009–2013 | Merged into the NDP |- ! style="background-color: #89CFF0 | | Serbian Radical Party RS Српска радикална странка PC Srpska radikalna stranka RS | SRS RS | Serbian nationalism National conservatism | Nikola Poplašen | 1996–2018 | Merged with SDS |} == References ==
title: List of political parties in Republika Srpska
